txt.en: The leader of the Jeweller's Guild has set you to work completing orders for the upcoming royal wedding!
The crafting recipes you must create can be bartered for from the Improved Recipes vendor.\n\nForge a guild-pattern ithilharn necklace.
Execute the recipe for a guild-pattern ithilharn necklace

'Jeweller! King Elessar and the Lady Arwen are to be married soon. We've received the first of what I imagine will be many orders for jewellery to be worn by officials during the ceremony. These must be some of the finest pieces to ever bear our seal. I trust you will do us proud.'

'Jeweller! King Elessar and the Lady Arwen are to be married soon. We've received the first of what I imagine will be many orders for jewellery to be worn by officials during the ceremony. These must be some of the finest pieces to ever bear our seal. I trust you will do us proud.'
Turn in a guild-pattern ithilharn necklace ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to Aldúlf
'Thank you, jeweller. I'll escort these pieces to the ceremony when the time comes. I hope you can attend so you can see your handiwork!'
Talk to the Jeweller's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
Turn in a guild-pattern ithilharn necklace ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to the Jeweller's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
'Thank you, jeweller. I'll escort these pieces to the ceremony when the time comes. I hope you can attend so you can see your handiwork!'
